channel.title: Don't miss out on our Contest perfect for Roleplayers
channel.description:
The Valentine's Day Throne of Love contest is now live and it is perfect for everyone that participates in this section of the forums.
Write me your best love story or poem in the theme of Courtly Love, the chivalrous form of medieval courtship.
We are giving away up to 10 free keys. Don't miss out (especially since every entry won last contest)

item.title: Don't miss out on our Contest perfect for Roleplayers
item.dc:creator: Thunder
item.source: Don't miss out on our Contest perfect for Roleplayers
